Faq2.faq1: Talktopia is a global video chat service with real-time translation. Hover over the animals on the main page to instantly meet friends from various countries.
Faq2.faq60: And if you want to meet a friend who communicates well, you can create a chat room by clicking 'Create a Room' on the main page and invite friends you've met.
Faq2.faq2: How are users connected in the video chat app?
Faq2.faq3: The video chat app is connected with a global server infrastructure, connecting users from various regions worldwide. Depending on the region and language, appropriate servers are used to ensure smooth communication.
Faq2.faq5: How many languages does Talktopia support?
Faq2.faq6: Talktopia supports 12 languages: Korean, German, Russian, Spanish, English, Italian, Indonesian, Japanese, French, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, and Hindi. Thank you.
Faq2.faq8: Is there a limit to the number of participants in a video chat?
Faq2.faq9: You can have a minimum of 2 participants and a maximum of 6 participants in a video chat.
Faq2.faq11: How do I create or join a video chat room?
Faq2.faq12: You can start a new chat on the main screen or create a video chat room directly. You can also join chats that your friends have invited you to.
Faq2.faq14: Can I view chat history in the chat room?
Faq2.faq15: No, you cannot view chat history. However, please note that administrators can review the conversation content during video chat to prevent malicious use.
Faq2.faq18: How can I change my personal information?
Faq2.faq19: Click the user icon in the top right corner and select 'View My Info'. After entering your password for privacy protection, you can change your photo, name, password, and preferred language.
Faq2.faq21: What should I do if another user behaves inappropriately?
Faq2.faq22: Click the 'Report' button at the bottom right of the screen of the user who displayed inappropriate behavior. Select the inappropriate behavior and the report will be completed. We will take appropriate action after confirmation. Thank you.
Faq2.faq24: What should I do if the video or audio does not work during a video chat?
Faq2.faq25: First, make sure your camera and microphone are properly connected. Also, check if the camera and microphone access permissions for the app are allowed in your device's settings. If the problem persists, try restarting your device.
Faq2.faqb: What should I do if I can't hear the other person?
Faq2.faqd: If the problem continues, please provide answers to the following questions through 1:1 inquiry. It will greatly help us to fix the error:
Faq2.faqe: 1. Whether the error occurs with a specific user or all users
Faq2.faqw: 2. Whether the error occurs during matching or video call
Faq2.faqg: 4. Whether there are sound issues in other apps as well
Faq2.faqh: 5. Whether earphones/headsets or Bluetooth earphones/headsets are used
Faq2.faq27: What should I do if the sound is not transmitted to the other person?
Faq2.faq29: If the problem continues, please provide answers to the following questions through 1:1 inquiry. It will greatly help us to fix the error:
Faq2.faq31: 2. Whether the error occurs with specific users or all users
Faq2.faq32: 3. Whether earphones/headsets or Bluetooth earphones/headsets are used
Faq2.faq33: 4. Whether music is played through the device during Talktopia use
Faq2.faq34: 5. Whether the same error occurs when using other sites
